item.title: [Pi]How can I remove PVP from Yanille?[Pi]
item.dc:creator: @iTechFuze iTechFuze
item.description:
@iTechFuze wrote:

[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:6, topic:437639”][quote author=iTechFuze link=topic=540342.msg3957045#msg3957045 date=1332866459]
Maybe this is it?

[code]if(inWild() && !isInPbox() && !isInArd() && !isInFala() && !inFunPk()) {
int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY;
wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1);
EarningPotential.checkPotential(this);
getPA().walkableInterface(197);
if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
if(inMulti()) {
getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: “+wildLevel, 199);
} else {
getPA().sendFrame126(”@yel@Level: “+wildLevel, 199);
}
} else {
getPA().multiWay(-1);
getPA().sendFrame126(”@yel@Level: “+wildLevel, 199);
}
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
} else if (!inWild() && safeTimer > 0){
getPA().walkableInterface(197);
wildLevel = (60);
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
getPA().sendFrame126(”@or1@"+safeTimer, 199);
} else if(inPcBoat()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(21005);
} else if(inPcGame()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(21100);
} else if (inDuelArena()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(201);
if(duelStatus == 5) {
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
} else {
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Challenge”, 1);
}
} else if (inFunPk()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(197);
getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@FunPk", 199);
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
} else if(inBarrows()){
getPA().sendFrame99(2);
getPA().sendFrame126("Kill Count: "+barrowsKillCount, 4536);
getPA().walkableInterface(4535);

	} else if(inGWD()){
	        getPA().GWKC();


	} else if(safeZone()){
		getPA().walkableInterface(197);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
			if(inMulti()) {
				getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@SafeZone", 199);
			} else {
				getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@SafeZone", 199);
			}
		} else {
			getPA().multiWay(-1);
				getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@SafeZone", 199);
					}
	

	} else if(isInFala()){
		int modY = absY > 6400 ?  absY - 6400 : absY;
		wildLevel = 12;
		getPA().walkableInterface(197);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
			if(inMulti()) {
			HighAndLow();
				} else {
				HighAndLow();
			}
			}
	} else if(isInPbox()){
		int modY = absY > 6400 ?  absY - 6400 : absY;
		wildLevel = 12;
		getPA().walkableInterface(197);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
			if(inMulti()) {
			HighAndLow();
				} else {
				HighAndLow();
			}
			}
	} else if(isInArd()){
		int modY = absY > 6400 ?  absY - 6400 : absY;
		wildLevel = 12;
		getPA().walkableInterface(197);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
			if(inMulti()) {
			HighAndLow();
				} else {
				HighAndLow();
			}
		} else {
			getPA().multiWay(-1);
		HighAndLow();}
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
	} else if (inCwGame || inPits) {
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);		
	} else if (getPA().inPitsWait()) {
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null", 1);
	}else if (!inCwWait) {
		getPA().sendFrame99(0);
		getPA().walkableInterface(-1);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null", 1);[/code]

[/quote]

That’s it right there. For PI, inWild is what it’s for being PVP.[/quote]

But where can I find Yanille? I have look for the x and y, but they are there.

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi]How can I remove PVP from Yanille?[Pi]

item.title: [Pi]How can I remove PVP from Yanille?[Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“iTechFuze, post:5, topic:437639”]Maybe this is it?

[code]if(inWild() && !isInPbox() && !isInArd() && !isInFala() && !inFunPk()) {
int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY;
wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1);
EarningPotential.checkPotential(this);
getPA().walkableInterface(197);
if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
if(inMulti()) {
getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: “+wildLevel, 199);
} else {
getPA().sendFrame126(”@yel@Level: “+wildLevel, 199);
}
} else {
getPA().multiWay(-1);
getPA().sendFrame126(”@yel@Level: “+wildLevel, 199);
}
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
} else if (!inWild() && safeTimer > 0){
getPA().walkableInterface(197);
wildLevel = (60);
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
getPA().sendFrame126(”@or1@"+safeTimer, 199);
} else if(inPcBoat()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(21005);
} else if(inPcGame()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(21100);
} else if (inDuelArena()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(201);
if(duelStatus == 5) {
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
} else {
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Challenge”, 1);
}
} else if (inFunPk()) {
getPA().walkableInterface(197);
getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@FunPk", 199);
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
} else if(inBarrows()){
getPA().sendFrame99(2);
getPA().sendFrame126("Kill Count: "+barrowsKillCount, 4536);
getPA().walkableInterface(4535);

	} else if(inGWD()){
	        getPA().GWKC();


	} else if(safeZone()){
		getPA().walkableInterface(197);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
			if(inMulti()) {
				getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@SafeZone", 199);
			} else {
				getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@SafeZone", 199);
			}
		} else {
			getPA().multiWay(-1);
				getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@SafeZone", 199);
					}
	

	} else if(isInFala()){
		int modY = absY > 6400 ?  absY - 6400 : absY;
		wildLevel = 12;
		getPA().walkableInterface(197);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
			if(inMulti()) {
			HighAndLow();
				} else {
				HighAndLow();
			}
			}
	} else if(isInPbox()){
		int modY = absY > 6400 ?  absY - 6400 : absY;
		wildLevel = 12;
		getPA().walkableInterface(197);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
			if(inMulti()) {
			HighAndLow();
				} else {
				HighAndLow();
			}
			}
	} else if(isInArd()){
		int modY = absY > 6400 ?  absY - 6400 : absY;
		wildLevel = 12;
		getPA().walkableInterface(197);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
			if(inMulti()) {
			HighAndLow();
				} else {
				HighAndLow();
			}
		} else {
			getPA().multiWay(-1);
		HighAndLow();}
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
	} else if (inCwGame || inPits) {
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);		
	} else if (getPA().inPitsWait()) {
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null", 1);
	}else if (!inCwWait) {
		getPA().sendFrame99(0);
		getPA().walkableInterface(-1);
		getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null", 1);[/code][/quote]

That’s it right there. For PI, inWild is what it’s for being PVP.

item.title: [Pi]How can I remove PVP from Yanille?[Pi]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Open up Client.java and search for code:

The code should look like this:

public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((coordY >= yyyy) && (coordY <= yyyy) && (coordX >= xxxx) && (coordX <= xxxx)) { return true; } return false;

Play around with the Coordinates, and delete the ones you don’t want.

Read full topic
